title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: NEAR Drops 5.4% as Almost All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polkadot (DOT) was also among the underperformers, falling 5.3% from Thursday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3130.42, down 1.7% (-54.58) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

One of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (+0.5%) and BTC (-0.2%).

Laggards: NEAR (-5.4%) and DOT (-5.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports that almost all assets are trading lower with the CoinDesk 20 index down 1.7% and specific cryptocurrencies like NEAR and DOT dropping over 5%.
